summary: A grief-stricken cop and an amputee grandmaster are brought together by a peculiar twist of fate as part of a wider conspiracy that has darkened their lives.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Farhan Akhtar|Aditi Rao Hydari|Manav Kaul|Neil Nitin Mukesh|John Abraham|Anjum Sharma|Prakash Belawadi|Murli Sharma|Nasirr Khan|Seema Bhargava|Nishigandha Wad|Saachi Tiwari|Vaidehi Parshurami|Vivekanand Singh|Ajay Arya|Avtar Gill|Gargi Patel|Lakshay Kumar|Mazel Vyas|Jasleen Singh|Jasveer|Reem Shaikh|Kedar|Hardik Ruparel|Manpreet|Satakshy Nandy|Hemabharti Palani|Pooja Kadam|Akshata Joshi|Fawas Ameer|Megna Nambiar|Tony Pious|Purnendrakumar Meshram|Amruth|Snigdha Prabhakar|Nihal Pasha|Shaila Tike|Sylvester Mardi|Anandita Ghosh|Parth Bharadwaj|Sameera Kumar|Vinod Nanaware|Sachin Danai|Diana Pinto|Abhimanyu Sarkar
title: Wazir
